channel.title: Version 3.4 :: Cap'n Hugo Relearrrn Theme
channel.description: 3.4.1 (2022-04-03) Fixes [bug] theme: fix IE11 incompatibilities #234 3.4.0 (2022-04-03) Enhancements [feature] i18n: add Traditional Chinese translat'n #233 [feature] menu: expand/collapse menu items without navigat'n #231 [feature] print: add opt'n t' print whole chapter #230 [feature][break'n] theme: apply user supplied rrrambl'n footer below rrrambl'n #229 Fixes [bug] theme: scroll t' head'n on initial board #232
